label: Description
value: A boy in overalls and a hat leans on a rail fence looking ahead at the viewer against a background of trees, meadow flowers, grasses, and a wheat field.

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of a young woman in white flounce dress standing in center; leaning against a hammock swung from supports beyond the right and left edges of picture; resting her arms on farther edges of hammock and looking down.  A fan hangs from a cord around her right wrist.

value: A line of eroded cliffs rises from a plateau, while a stream traverses the bottom of a deep canyon.

The Canyon of the Rio Virgin, South Utah

label: Description
value:
Recto: Horizontal view of rock formations seen across the valley and river.  Some plants are in the foreground. Many notations refer to the colors and to the kinds of formations.

Verso: Slightly sketched view of a mountain lake (?)

label: Description
value: Vertical view of canyon shown between two rock towers.

value: Horizontal view of a large body of water in foreground and mountain ranges in the background.

View from Powell's Plateau, Grand Canyon, Colorado

label: Description
value:
Recto: View of the Grand Canyon from the rim of Powell's Plateau, one of the most scenic vistas of the Grand Canyon and Colorado River, named after the explorer and geologist John Wesley Powell, leader of the Colorado River Expedition.
Verso: Barely decipherable landscape (?) in ruled graphite border.

label: Physical description
value: Recto: Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on tan wove paper Verso: Graphite on paper

label: Notes
value: Recto: View of the Grand Canyon from the rim of Powell's Plateau, one of the most scenic vistas of the Grand Canyon and Colorado River, named after the explorer and geologist John Wesley Powell, leader of the Colorado River Expedition.
Canyon of the Rio Virgin, South Utah

label: Description
value:
A group on horseback is crossing a low point of the river in center foreground, while tall white cliffs rise at left. In the distance, a low rise of rock outcroppings in mauve tones is silhouetted against a backdrop of ivory colored peaks under a heavy blue sky. 
Verso: Sketches of three small objects in graphite.

label: Physical description
value: Recto: Brush and watercolor, graphite on white wove paper Verso: Graphite on paper

label: Notes
value: A group on horseback is crossing a low point of the river in center foreground, while tall white cliffs rise at left. In the distance, a low rise of rock outcroppings in mauve tones is silhouetted against a backdrop of ivory colored peaks under a heavy blue sky.
The Grand Canyon in the Rain

label: Description
value: Panorama of the Grand Canyon as seen from perhaps the Muave Canyon.

value: Panorama of the Grand Canyon as seen from perhaps the Muave Canyon.

value: Vertical view in center foreground of a flowing brook rounding a tree-covered outcropping of rock and forming a pond with steep bare rocky mountain side at left in distance.

value: Oblique horizontal view of a mountain range across a valley with a peak whose fissures form the Cross in the left center.

value: Under a heavy grey sky, a deep chasm opens to a jagged cliff amid dark outcroppings, while touches of white punctuate a distant mountain.

value: Under a heavy grey sky, a deep chasm opens to a jagged cliff amid dark outcroppings, while touches of white punctuate a distant mountain.

label: Description
value: Vertical vista features the granite peak of Half Dome, Yosemite, looming between boulders in the foreground and snowcapped mountains in the distance.  In foreground, jutting rocks at center, pine trees and spruce at right.

value: Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on blue-gray wove paper

label: Notes
value: Vertical vista features the granite peak of Half Dome, Yosemite, looming between boulders in the foreground and snowcapped mountains in the distance. In foreground, jutting rocks at center, pine trees and spruce at right.

label: Description
value: Horizontal view across a flat river valley showing a mountain range in blue in the distance with a group of conifer trees suggested at right. The intermediate ranges are violet and blue and the water is green.

value: Brush and watercolor, white gouache, graphite on thin gray paper

value: Horizontal view of meadow in left foreground and a valley, beginning at the right, shown in the middle ground, with the Tetons in the central background.

label: Description
value: Vertical view with summits of Rockies separated by a lake and clouds bridging the gap.  Hiawatha, leaning on a rock in left foreground, raises his right arm in greeting. Mudjekeewis stands upon a summit in the back.

value: Graphite, pen and brown ink, brush and gray-brown wash on paper

Green River from the Ferry, Wyoming Territory

label: Description
value: Horizontal view of the river and sandbar in the foreground, receding diagonally to left.  Beyond, a line of castellated cliffs, with a fringe of trees at base.  Cliffs are a pale pink; river is blue, blue-gray and white; sky is white.

label: Physical description
value: Graphite, brush and watercolor, white gouache on gray wove paper

value: Landscape viewed horizontally across a body of water with a rocky mesa at right center. Dramatic red and white strata against blue sky reflected in water.
